com.nokia.maps.component

Class AbstractMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FocalObserverComponent, RestrictMapComponent, TooltipComponent, TouchComponent

    public abstract class AbstractMapComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapComponent
    This class offers an abstract base class for creating your own custom MapComponents. This class maintains a reference to the attached MapDisplay and handles the required identification and versioning of the MapComponent.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MapDisplay map
      This property holds a reference to the MapDisplay that the MapComponent is currently attached to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractMapComponent(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String version)
      This method instantiates the basis of an abstract MapComponent.

    • Method Summary

      void attach(MapDisplay map)
      This method is called whenever the component is attached to a MapDisplay, the component maintains a reference to the currently attached map.
      void detach(MapDisplay map)
      This method is invoked when the MapComponent is detached from a map.
      EventListener getEventListener()
      This method retrieves an instance of a EventListener associated with this MapComponent assuming one exists.

      This method retrieves a unique identifier of the MapComponent.
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      This method retrieves the version of the MapComponent.
      void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
      This method is called when the attached MapDisplay state changes.
      void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
      This method renders the MapComponent using the Graphics object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractMapComponent

        public AbstractMapComponent(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String version)
        This method instantiates the basis of an abstract MapComponent. Subclasses should call this method when they are created.
        Parameters:
        id - a unique ID for the MapComponent
        version - a version number for the MapComponent

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public void attach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is called whenever the component is attached to a MapDisplay, the component maintains a reference to the currently attached map.
        Specified by:
        attach in interface MapComponent
        Parameters:
        map - the MapDisplay the component is currently attached to.

      • detach

        public void detach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is invoked when the MapComponent is detached from a map. The component remove any references it holds to on the detached map.
        Specified by:
        detach in interface MapComponent
        Parameters:
        map - the MapDisplay the component is no longer attached to.

      • getId

        public final java.lang.String getId()
        This method retrieves a unique identifier of the MapComponent. It is prohibited to add multiple MapComponents with the same id to a map.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface MapComponent
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of the map component

      • getVersion

        public final java.lang.String getVersion()
        This method retrieves the version of the MapComponent.
        Specified by:
        getVersion in interface MapComponent
        Returns:
        The version of the map component

      • paint

        public void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
        This method renders the MapComponent using the Graphics object. The graphics object must not be stored for later use and may only be used within the scope of this paint() method. All MapComponent.paint() operations are done after the base map has been rendered. The graphics object is not clipped and rendering is done to whole area of the rendering target.
        Specified by:
        paint in interface MapComponent
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object used for rendering

      • mapUpdated

        public void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
        This method is called when the attached MapDisplay state changes. Override to respond to map update events.
        Specified by:
        mapUpdated in interface MapComponent
        Parameters:
        zoomChanged - Whether the zoom level of the MapDisplay has been changed. true if the zoom level has changed

      • getEventListener

        public EventListener getEventListener()
        This method retrieves an instance of a EventListener associated with this MapComponent assuming one exists.
        Specified by:
        getEventListener in interface MapComponent
        Returns:
        null since events are not catered for by default. Override this method to provide your own EventListener
